group_1.textRight: Are you sure it's a good idea for me to come @with you~?
What if they call me a traitor and get super @ticked off~?

group_1.textLeft: Now that Janomiya has joined with Torayamachi,
the fact is that Ryuugasaki is weaker than ever.
And bringing you is the best way to prove that.
She's right. Just having you there will be a huge help.

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure about that~...

group_1.textLeft: Plus, I need to know where to find the @Ryuugasaki girls.

group_1.textRight: Oho, is that what you really wanted me for?

group_1.textCenter: With things the way they are, I'd be stupid to go @against Torayamachi.
I'm still not happy with what happened, @so there's no way I'm joining you,
but I'll at least keep out of your business.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. That means a lot to us.

group_1.textCenter: You went out of your way to come to me with the @leader of Janomiya, huh?
You just here to flex how strong your gang is now? @Talk about poor taste.

group_1.textLeft: It's not like we're trying to wipe out Ryuugasaki.
We just think that all of the Magical Girls in @Futatsugi should unite together.

group_1.textRight: Even if Witches have been coming back, they might disappear again.
I don't want to bet on a short-lived hope that'll just make me suffer again later.

group_1.textLeft: We're not asking you to work with us forever.
However, we do believe that we should at least @be able to cooperate for the time being.

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe you have a point.

group_1.textCenter: Ahaha, alright, I'll join up with you.
Because Juri's is good as finished, and I like you.

group_1.textLeft: You like me~?

group_1.textRight: You pulled off some bold strats. That couldn't have been done without strong determination and leadership.
If a group led by you is with Torayamachi now, I'll be happy to join up too.
Just don't call me a two-timer, alright?

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a bunch~

group_1.textRight: I just have one condition.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: I want you to show me your proof.
The evidence that explains why Witches @disappeared, and why they're back now...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102103:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: I have a lot of respect for you, Yuna.
But I need to see that proof before I can fully @trust you.
Until then, I can't become an ally of yours.

group_1.textLeft: Very well. I understand...
This isn't going as smoothly as I thought it would.

group_1.textRight: Everyone seemed kind of neutral, basically~
I really didn't expect so many of them to still @believe in Juri.

group_1.textLeft: Even though she was obsessed with her grudge @against me, she still took care of her friends and kept @her word to them.
She is quite the unique case...
It appears that there was more holding them @together than her strength alone.

group_1.textRight: Still, it's only a matter of time before they collapse~
Ah.
I've got a solo run to do now~

group_1.textLeft: Where are you goin'?

group_1.textRight: Ryuugasaki's base.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€”?!

group_1.textRight: We haven't run into Ranka at all today,
so I bet that's where she is.

group_1.textLeft: If you go in alone, you won't make it out in one @piece...

group_1.textRight: I mean, Juri's probably still recovering from the @wounds my battle axe gave her, right~?
I won't have any problems dealing with a wounded dragon~

group_1.textLeft: I-I'll go with you! I can't let you go by yourself!
After all, I promised I'd protect you, Ao!

group_1.textRight: Back off, Hikaru. This is my fight.
